name: east-migration-progress-indicator-helper
description: East plugin which provides migration helper to log progress

scripts.makeCodeCoverageDetailReport: npm run testSpecified test -- --reporter dot --coverage --coverage-report html --no-browser test && echo "*** Code coverage report done, checkout ./coverage dir"
scripts.makeCodeCoverageSummaryReport: npm run testSpecified test -- --reporter dot --coverage --coverage-report text-summary test | sed -re 's/(Statements|Branches|Functions|Lines)/\1 code coverage/g'

author: Oleg Korobenko <oleg.korobenko@gmail.com>
